name: Jason Boog
bio: Jason Boog is an editor at mediabistro.com's publishing website, GalleyCat. His work has appeared in the Believer, Granta, Salon.com, the Revealer, and Peace Corps Writers. He recently finished a novel about a journalist who uncovers a sinister military-toy-industrial complex. He teaches journalism at NYU, and archives work on his personal website. (http://jasonboog.com).
